relatedQuestionAnswer.question: Can a New Institute apply for UG and PG in Engineering and Technology.
relatedQuestionAnswer.answer: No, Institute can opt for UG program and for PG Courses Institute shall require NBA.

relatedQuestionAnswer.question: How much land is required for Establishment of New Engineering College with UG program.
relatedQuestionAnswer.answer: There is no such minimum land requirement. Provided Institute should have required built up area and land as per FSI/FAR as applicable (Rural / Urban/ Mega/Metro Cities).
